recipe1.ingredients: 3 lb beef roast,1 tbsp olive oil,1 tsp salt
recipe1.cooking_method: Preheat oven to 375°F. Rub olive oil and salt on beef roast. Roast beef in oven for 1.5-2 hours or until internal temperature reaches desired doneness.

recipe2.ingredients: 1 cup pitted dates,1 cup boiling water,1 tsp baking soda
recipe2.cooking_method: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F.2. Blend dates, boiling water, and baking soda until smooth.3. Pour mixture into greased baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes.

recipe3.cooking_method: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.2. Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy, then remove and crumble.3. Beat eggs in a bowl and mix with spaghetti, bacon, and a little bit of pasta water.

short_bio: Gordon Ramsay is a world-renowned chef with over 30 years of experience in the culinary industry. He is known for his fiery personality and his ability to turn even the most basic ingredients into a gourmet meal.

recipe1.ingredients: 3 lb Lobster roast,1 tbsp olive oil,1 tsp salt
recipe1.cooking_method: Preheat oven to 375°F. Rub olive oil and salt on beef roast. Roast beef in oven for 1.5-2 hours or until internal temperature reaches desired doneness.

recipe2.ingredients: 1 lb stew chicken.3 carrots, peeled and chopped.2 potatoes, peeled and chopped
recipe2.cooking_method: 1. Brown stew beef in a large pot or Dutch oven.2. Add in chopped carrots, potatoes, and enough water or broth to cover.3. Simmer for 1-2 hours, or until beef and vegetables are tender.

recipe3.ingredients: 1/2 cups all-purpose flour.2 tsp baking powder,3/4 cup granulated sugar
recipe3.cooking_method: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F.2. Mix together flour, baking powder, and sugar in a bowl,3. Add in eggs, lemon juice, and zest, and mix until smooth. Pour into greased baking dish and bake for 30-35 minutes.

short_bio: Ina Garten is an American chef and cookbook author. She is known for her simple yet elegant approach to cooking and her use of fresh, high-quality ingredients.

short_bio: Nigella Lawson is an English food writer and television personality. She is known for her indulgent recipes and her love of comfort food.

recipe1.ingredients: 1 baguette,4 oz grilled pork,2 tbsp mayonnaise
recipe1.cooking_method: 1. Slice baguette and spread mayonnaise on one side.2. Add grilled pork, pickled vegetables, and cilantro to the sandwich.3. Serve immediately and enjoy!
